intro.p: Indicates the transaction support for a method.

section.title: TransactionAttribute()
section.p: Declares unspecified values for transaction and isolation, which means that the transaction manager will use the default values for them

section.title: TransactionAttribute(TransactionMode transactionMode)
section.p: Declares the transaction mode, but omits the isolation, which means that the transaction manager should use the default value for it.

section.title: TransactionAttribute(TransactionMode transactionMode, IsolationMode isolationMode)
section.p: Declares both the transaction mode and isolation desired for this method. The transaction manager should obey the declaration.
